name: SpeechSynthesisEvent.utterance
description: The utterance read-only property of the SpeechSynthesisUtterance interface returns the SpeechSynthesisUtterance instance that the event was triggered on.
content:
This is an experimental technology
Check the Browser compatibility table carefully before using this in production.

The utterance read-only property of the SpeechSynthesisUtterance interface returns the SpeechSynthesisUtterance instance that the event was triggered on.
